title: Learning Design and Knowledge Formation Strategies in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of elementary education
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning activities: Enhancing understanding of multicultural societies and knowledge transformation processes

learning_goals: Components of the Learning Design Sequence (LDS) can be identified and applied to actual educational contexts
Knowledge-construction activities utilizing diverse digital media (text, images, videos) can be designed
UGC-based assessment strategies can be developed and applied to formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
